website_summaries.verdict: The majority of owners have a lot of good things to say about the Adidas AdiZero 5-Star 7.0. According to them, these football shoes are light, stylish, comfortable, supportive, durable, and have excellent traction on both turf and grass. It seems the only major complaint is the awkward fit brought about by the cleat’s cleatie construction. Overall, the Adidas AdiZero 5-Star 7.0 is a super light football cleat that is highly recommended for skill players.
pros: These low-top Adidas football cleats are perfect for skill players, a good number of users exclaim
They highly recommend grabbing a pair
The AdiZero 5-Star 7.0 stays true to its name, nearly all players attest
According to them, these Adidas cleats are super lightweight
These football cleats fit well, several wearers declare
They claim that the cleats run true to size and are comfortably snug
A handful of wearers are saying that the Adidas AdiZero 5-Star 7.0 is easy to break in
These Adidas football cleats offer great traction on the field, some reviewers report
A tester even says that the 5-Star 7.0 feels like it has more grip than its predecessors
Nearly all owners love how comfortable these Adidas cleats feel on their feet
They claim that moving in these cleats is easy since the materials are quite pliable
The quality of these Adidas football cleats is just phenomenal, several owners are reporting
They are saying that the AdiZero 5-Star 7.0 is one tough football cleat
A few players observe that these low-top football cleats offer decent support
A reviewer says that the Techfit-like sock liner provides a secure fit that reduces internal slippage
These Adidas cleats are very stylish, a lot of reviewers comment
They are saying that the cleats look pretty dope
cons: A good number of owners are complaining that the AdiZero 5-Star 7.0 is painfully narrow
A few wearers are reporting that the front of the cleat folds awkwardly
The Adidas AdiZero 5-Star 7.0 is a pain to put on, several owners complain
According to a handful of users, the outsole is not as flexible as the previous models

customer_reviews.title: Very lite on the feet but still feel sturdy when he makes his cuts
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES this cleats. Very lite on the feet but still feel sturdy when he makes his cuts. After a few practices they broke in really well. He is a tight end on the varsity team, 6'00 180 and needed a lite shoe to help with his speed. They worked.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H

customer_reviews.title: They Work!
customer_reviews.text: These cleats are high quality and super light. The high school quarterback I bought them for loves them. He was slipping around in his old cleats. These made a big difference: no more slipping and he can get around much better.
customer_reviews.author: sharonzbox

customer_reviews.title: They are super lightweight
customer_reviews.text: These cleats were for my grandson who plays high school football. He had one specific cleat in mind and these were it. He loves them because they are so lightweight and have the fitted ankle sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Super light great fit !!!
customer_reviews.text: Super light shoe no break in needed !! My son went right into a 3 hour practice.
customer_reviews.author: edmond plis

customer_reviews.title: Light shoes
customer_reviews.text: These were incredibly light shoes (which my son loved) however he found them difficult to bend. The material is very thin yet stiff. We ended up returning them.
customer_reviews.author: A. Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Lasted the whole football season with no issue.
customer_reviews.author: Will A.

customer_reviews.title: SUPER LIGHT but made so well
customer_reviews.text: SUPER LIGHT but made so well! My son is already enjoying these for football camp and his teammates love the color/design.
customer_reviews.author: petticoatpoms

customer_reviews.title: football
customer_reviews.text: my son is a football player he love ow light weight they are and he can run faster they hold him down thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect buy
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I was hoping for I looked and there was no store that was selling in store and I needed them ASAP. Arrived in two days and they were perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Show
customer_reviews.text: They look great on my son and he said they felt great and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Eli Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great for very comfortable better break in before playing in them
customer_reviews.author: Sajida Allyce

customer_reviews.title: Not the right fit
customer_reviews.text: Product sizing is way off. These were way too small. Yet listed as the size he wears in every other shoe
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and great fit
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived very fast in only 4 days and in pristine condition. Extremely lightweight and fits like a glove. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Lim Yu Xuan

customer_reviews.title: My son loved the style and brand
customer_reviews.text: My son loved the style and brand. But he did say the shoes were tight and not flexible. But believes once he breaks them in it will be better.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly E

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my 12yr old son he loves them as do everybody else...5stars
customer_reviews.author: frederick hankerson

customer_reviews.title: Gold peels
customer_reviews.text: A good bit of the gold on the side of cleat peeled off after my son wore it the very first time.. very disappointing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Fit great. My son threw 5 more touchdowns because of them- not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Football cleats
customer_reviews.text: My 14 yrs old son enjoyed the look and comfortable wear to support his ankles while playing football!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Return
customer_reviews.text: I ordered It as a mistake I do not like it and I thought it’s a soccer cleats but it’s not and it is a football cleats
customer_reviews.author: Rehswag

customer_reviews.title: Great speed cleat
customer_reviews.text: Son uses them for lacrosse. Likes how low cut they are, so he can be active on the field.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They look beautiful
customer_reviews.text: My coach was colorblind so he didn't know they were gold
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Jo Banks

customer_reviews.title: Great cleat
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cleat. Lightweight. Secure cutting despite low top design. Design is better in person.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel de Waal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: everything was great i really appreciate the time and effort of help getting the product to me
customer_reviews.author: Javoris Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable during gameplay.... breaks in quickly and fits foot very good..love them
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Lawrence Shaw Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe!!!. The fit was great. The so itself is very light and flexible but sturdy for a great support.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey list

customer_reviews.title: My Grandson loves his cleats. The style is awesome. He is a serious football player..
customer_reviews.text: no dislike at all. My grandson uses the cleats for football.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth iaconetti

customer_reviews.title: Best Adidas cleats...
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves his new cleats and they are super light ...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super light
customer_reviews.text: I bought two (cleats) nike and adizero and this one is light.Fit's perfectly as expected very nice.. i recommend this to all the athlete also my friends just recommend this to me.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are really great football cleats with good stability and are very good for kicking and punting
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It is all plastic and i Didnt know. I honestly not likinv it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My son used these for football. They worked very well with his ankle brace.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Bell

product_meta.title: adidas mens - Adizero 5-star 7.0
feature_bullets: Heel cup locks the foot in place
Bootie construction for a precise, comfortable fit
Anatomical lace structure helps relieve pressure for a comfortable fit
Speed Spat seam tape is tactfully placed to elevate lockdown andpromote a natural flex in the upper
SPRINTFRAME plate with external heel counter features SPRINTSTUDS and a rotational traction zone delivering unrivaled traction
